WorkItem.Description: Is Rawr still not working for healing priests, i have tried it again this week after the patch and still nothing, coming up blank. Will we see this working at all soon?

Comments.Message: I too would love to see Rawr working with Holy and Disc priets (holy first if there is a priority..) I've been waiting for ages to use rawr with this! please update! >_<

As per the Models page:
http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Models

Heal priest is non-functional.  If you know a C# dev who wants to contribute some patches/functionality... get him/her to start working on it.
